title: Stage Lv7-P4-S24
description: Level 7 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Although the weather was bad, we continued the expedition because we had limited time, provided that safety measures were maintained.
While we were analyzing the data, if new information became available, we would incorporate it even though it might delay our conclusions.
learning_points: Level 7 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 날씨가 나빴지만, 시간이 제한적이었기 때문에 안전 조치가 유지되는 조건 하에 원정을 계속했다.
sentences.en: Although the weather was bad, we continued the expedition because we had limited time, provided that safety measures were maintained.

sentences.kr: 데이터를 분석하고 있는 동안, 새로운 정보가 나오면, 결론이 지연될 수 있더라도 그것을 포함시킬 것이다.
sentences.en: While we were analyzing the data, if new information became available, we would incorporate it even though it might delay our conclusions.

sentences.kr: 프로젝트가 급했기 때문에, 추가 자원이 할당되지 않는다면, 아무리 열심히 노력해도 완료를 보장할 수 없었다.
sentences.en: Since the project was urgent, unless additional resources were allocated, we couldn't guarantee completion, however hard we tried.

sentences.kr: 회의가 진행되는 동안, 모든 사람이 참석한다면, 비록 시간이 오래 걸려도 합의에 도달할 수 있을 것이다.
sentences.en: While the meeting is in progress, if everyone attends, we should reach an agreement even though it may take considerable time.

sentences.kr: 자금이 부족했지만, 팀이 헌신적이었기 때문에 기술적 문제가 해결되는 조건 하에 성공할 수 있었다.
sentences.en: Although funding was limited, because the team was dedicated, we could succeed provided that technical issues were resolved.

sentences.kr: 시장이 불안정한 동안, 투자자들이 지원하지 않는다면, 아무리 좋은 아이디어라도 성공하지 못할 것이다.
sentences.en: While the market remains unstable, if investors don't provide support, even the best ideas won't succeed, however innovative they may be.

sentences.kr: 연구가 계속되는 한, 윤리적 기준이 유지된다면, 비록 결과가 예상과 다르더라도 가치가 있을 것이다.
sentences.en: As long as research continues, if ethical standards are maintained, it will be valuable even though results may differ from expectations.

sentences.kr: 경제가 회복되기 전까지는, 정부가 개입하지 않는다면, 아무리 노력해도 완전한 해결책을 찾기 어려울 것이다.
sentences.en: Until the economy recovers, unless the government intervenes, it will be difficult to find complete solutions however much effort we make.
